edu.cmu.sphinx.fst

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.fst.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmutableState

    public class State
extends Object
    The fst's mutable state implementation. Holds its outgoing Arc objects in an ArrayList allowing additions/deletions
    Author:
    John Salatas

      Constructor specifying the initial capacity of the arc's ArrayList (this is an optimization used in various operations)
